author: epg
msg: Fix up switch/lock/unlock logging to match changes on trunk.
(svn_log__lock, svn_log__unlock): Take apr array of paths to log
wrappers for the cases where svnserve and mod-dav-svn are locking
(switch_cmd): Drop TODO comment and from_revnum to svn_log__switch().
(lock_many): Allocate full_path out of pool rather than the loop's
subpool so we can save them in a new apr array and pass that to
(unlock_many): Allocate full_path out of pool rather than the loop's
subpool so we can save them in a new apr array and pass that to
